protein.specific_function: Binds to spermatozoa upon ejaculation and may play a role in sperm capacitation. Has phosphorylcholine-binding activity

reference.reference_text: Saalmann A, Munz S, Ellerbrock K, Ivell R, Kirchhoff C: Novel sperm-binding proteins of epididymal origin contain four fibronectin type II-modules. Mol Reprod Dev. 2001 Jan;58(1):88-100.
